009package Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMapper;
015import imagingbook.lib.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
017import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
018import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
019
020public class Transform_Affine implements PlugInFilter {
021
022    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
023        return DOES_ALL;
024    }
025
026    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
027        Pnt2d[] P = {
028                        PntInt.from(0, 0),
029                        PntInt.from(400, 0),
030                        PntInt.from(400, 400)
031        };
032
033        Pnt2d[] Q = {
034                        PntInt.from(0, 60),
035                        PntInt.from(400, 20),
036                         PntInt.from(300, 400)
037        };
038
039                // inverse mapping (target to source):
040                //AffineMapping2D imap = AffineMapping2D.from3Points(p1, p2, p3, q1, q2, q3).getInverse(); 
041                AffineMapping2D imap = AffineMapping2D.fromPoints(P, Q).getInverse(); 
042                ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(imap, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
043                mapper.map(ip);
044    }
045}
